cta.curious: Want to know what ASRR can mean for you company?

case.text_2: Trupo is a bold new way for people who work for themselves to get insurance benefits. Their experts are committed to providing each of their customers with a better sense of security and control by recommending the best insurance products for their individual needs. No upselling, no loopholes, just solution

web-applications.title: Web Applications
web-applications.text: We create progressive web applications that give your end-user the best experience possible, using native features and offline caching combined with seamless integration with our back-end systems. Click read more for a full list of advantages!

preview.title: Web Application
preview.text: We create progressive web applications that give your end-user the best experience possible, using native features and offline caching combined with seamless integration with our back-end systems. Click read more for a full list of advantages!

data-analytics.title: Data Analytics | BI
data-analytics.text: Analysing data correctly can save any company from excess costs and inefficiency. Using our BI analytics on one of your existing or a new database, ASRR will provide insights into key aspects of your data.

servers.title: Servers | Hardware
servers.text: Slow and old systems can cause serious hinder in both security and efficiency. That's why we build our servers from scratch, selecting the right parts for the job at hand. Using this we can create remote desktop environments, data storage servers and machines optimized for heavy rendering.

back-end.text: Using our microservice architecture, we can quickly create robust applications. We have an extensive library of over-engineered microservices that form a good basis for any complex application.

power-bi.title: Scalable Teams
power-bi.text: ASRR offers dynamic, multi-disciplinary IT teams that can be hired at short notice. The team will adapt to your needs, ensuring you have the right person at the right place, every time.
